testcase.name: As a user, I can get all product
As a user, I can get a single product
As a user, I can limits the result
As a user, I can sort products by descending
As a user, I can sort products by ascending
As a user, I can get all categories
As a user, I can get in a specific category
As a user, I can add new product
As a user, I cannot add new product with empty fields
